0.name: launch
0.shortDescription: transform your business vision into reality with comprehensive launch support. we handle legal structuring, registrations, and compliance—so you can focus on building your dream venture.
0.longDescription:
starting a business shouldn't feel overwhelming. our launch service transforms complexity into clarity, guiding you from concept to fully operational entity with confidence and speed.
 
 we provide end-to-end support in selecting the optimal legal structure—whether private limited company, llp, or other entity types—based on your growth plans, liability considerations, and operational needs. our team manages all critical registrations including din, dsc, incorporation filings, and initial compliance requirements.
 
 with deep regulatory expertise and a commitment to excellence, we ensure your business foundation is robust, compliant, and built for scalability. we don't just process paperwork—we partner with you to establish a solid platform for lasting success.
0.highlights: strategic business structure consultation tailored to your vision expert guidance on entity selection (plc, llp, opc, etc.) fast-track din/dsc processing and incorporation filing complete regulatory compliance from day one dedicated support throughout the launch journey foundation built for sustainable growth and scalability

1.name: incorporation
1.shortDescription: expert end-to-end company formation services. from selecting the right structure to completing all legal formalities—we make incorporation seamless, compliant, and stress-free.
1.longDescription:
choosing the right business structure is one of the most critical decisions you'll make. our incorporation services combine legal expertise with practical business insight to help you launch correctly the first time.
 
 we guide you through every entity type—private limited company, llp, opc, partnership, sole proprietorship, section 8 company, or foreign subsidiary—helping you understand the implications for liability, taxation, compliance, and growth potential. our team handles complete documentation, mca filings, name approvals, moa/aoa preparation, and all regulatory submissions.
 
 beyond formation, we ensure post-incorporation compliance including board meetings, statutory filings, and ongoing regulatory obligations. this comprehensive approach means you can focus entirely on building your business while we manage the legal complexities.
1.highlights: comprehensive consultation on optimal business structure complete documentation and mca filing handled expertly integrated gst, pan, tan, and other essential registrations post-incorporation compliance support and guidance fast turnaround with zero paperwork hassle ideal for startups, smes, and international founders

2.name: private limited company
2.shortDescription: private limited company (plc) registration enables entrepreneurs to establish a company that offers limited liability, a distinct legal identity, and enhanced capabilities to raise capital effectively.
2.longDescription: forming a private limited company includes selecting a company name, preparing the memorandum of association (moa) and articles of association (aoa), applying for dsc and din for directors, and submitting incorporation forms to the registrar of companies. this structure offers limited liability protection, attracts investors, and enhances market credibility. it is perfect for startups and growth-oriented businesses, ensuring compliance with corporate laws while providing flexibility in ownership and management.
2.highlights: legal structure selection: professional advice to help you choose the perfect entity (plc, llp, etc.) that ensures optimal growth and liability protection.

3.name: limited liability partnership llp
3.shortDescription: llp registration combines the benefits of a partnership and a company, offering limited liability to partners and simplified compliance.
3.longDescription: limited liability partnership (llp) registration is suited for professionals and small businesses. it provides a legal entity separate from its partners, limiting personal liability. the process includes obtaining dscs, dins, naming the llp, filing incorporation forms with the mca, and executing the llp agreement. llps enjoy operational flexibility, simplified taxation, and credibility with clients. this structure ensures both partners are protected from business debts while maintaining an easy governance model compared to traditional companies.

4.name: one person company opc
4.shortDescription: opc allows a single entrepreneur to start a company with limited liability and full control over management.
4.longDescription: opc registration enables a sole entrepreneur to create a company with limited liability, combining the benefits of a private company with the simplicity of sole proprietorship. the registration process includes obtaining dsc, din, reserving a unique company name, and filing incorporation documents with the registrar of companies. opcs are ideal for solo entrepreneurs looking for a formal business structure, easier access to funding, and compliance advantages. this structure allows scaling the business later by converting to a private limited company while protecting personal assets.
4.highlights: rapid registration & setup: streamlined process for quick din/dsc and incorporation filing.

5.name: foreign subsidiary
5.shortDescription: a foreign subsidiary registration allows international companies to establish an indian legal entity for business operations.
5.longDescription: establishing a foreign subsidiary in india requires compliance with the companies act and rbi regulations. the process includes approval of the company name, filing incorporation forms with the registrar of companies, and meeting foreign investment regulations. this structure allows foreign companies to operate locally, manage finances efficiently, comply with indian laws, and expand market presence. it provides limited liability protection and credibility among local clients and partners.

6.name: section 8 company
6.shortDescription: section 8 company registration helps create non-profit organizations with legal status and credibility.
6.longDescription: section 8 company registration is designed for charitable, social, or non-profit initiatives. it involves drafting moa and aoa, applying for dsc and din for directors, obtaining licenses under section 8 of the companies act, and filing incorporation documents with the registrar of companies. this structure allows the organization to operate legally, receive donations, enjoy tax exemptions, and demonstrate transparency and credibility to stakeholders while pursuing non-profit objectives.
6.highlights: compliance certainty: zero-stress assurance that all initial regulatory hurdles are successfully cleared.

7.name: partnership registration
7.shortDescription: partnership registration formalizes a business partnership, providing legal recognition and clarity in roles.
7.longDescription: registering a partnership involves drafting a partnership deed outlining rights, responsibilities, profit sharing, and management roles among partners. filing the deed with the registrar of firms ensures legal recognition and enables the partnership to operate formally. registration provides credibility, protects partners’ interests, facilitates opening business accounts, and helps resolve disputes efficiently. this process ensures structured governance and smooth operation of the partnership business.

8.name: sole propreitorship
8.shortDescription: sole proprietorship registration allows an individual to operate a business with minimal compliance and full control.
8.longDescription: a sole proprietorship is the simplest form of business registration, where a single owner manages all operations. registration is optional but can include gst, local licenses, or trade permits. this structure offers full control, quick setup, and minimal compliance requirements. it is ideal for small businesses or startups, enabling the proprietor to handle operations, finances, and taxation while benefiting from direct decision-making and easy management of business activities.

9.name: registrations
9.shortDescription: hassle-free business registrations ensuring full compliance across gst, msme, pf/esic, professional tax, iec, and more. get registered quickly, correctly, and with complete confidence.
9.longDescription:
operating legally and maintaining credibility requires the right registrations. our registration services eliminate confusion and delays, ensuring your business obtains all necessary licenses and registrations efficiently.
 
 we handle everything from gst registration and msme certification to startup india recognition, pf/esic enrollment, professional tax, shop & establishment licenses, fssai, and import-export code. our team conducts thorough eligibility assessments, prepares accurate documentation, manages submissions with authorities, and provides follow-up until approvals are secured.
 
 whether you're a new startup, ecommerce seller, or expanding business, we ensure timely compliance across all registrations—giving you the legal standing to operate, access government benefits, and build trust with stakeholders.
9.highlights: one-stop solution for all statutory business registrations expert guidance on eligibility and required documentation end-to-end filing support with zero paperwork burden fast approvals through accurate submissions and follow-up coverage across gst, msme, startup india, pf/esic, pt, iec, and more proactive alerts for renewals and amendments

10.name: gst registration
10.shortDescription: gst registration helps businesses comply with tax laws and claim input credits efficiently.
10.longDescription: gst registration involves obtaining a unique gstin, understanding applicable tax rates, and filing regular returns to the government. compliance ensures businesses can legally charge and collect gst, claim input tax credits, and avoid penalties. this process is crucial for ecommerce sellers, enabling smooth financial operations, proper accounting, and maintaining legal and tax compliance across multiple states and marketplaces. professional guidance ensures timely filing, reconciliation, and accurate tax reporting.

11.name: startup india recognition
11.shortDescription: startup india recognition provides benefits and incentives to registered startups under government schemes.
11.longDescription: obtaining startup india recognition involves applying through the official portal, providing business details, innovation descriptions, and incorporation documents. recognized startups gain access to government benefits such as tax exemptions, funding support, easier compliance procedures, and mentorship opportunities. this status increases credibility with investors, partners, and customers, helping the startup grow efficiently while enjoying regulatory and financial support.

12.name: msme registrations
12.shortDescription: msme registration enables small businesses to access government schemes and financial benefits.
12.longDescription: msme registration involves submitting business details to the udyam portal, including ownership, activity, and investment information. once registered, businesses can avail benefits like easier access to loans, subsidies, tax incentives, and credit support. the process ensures legal recognition, enhances credibility with clients and lenders, and provides support for growth, technology adoption, and competitive advantage in the market.

13.name: pf registration
13.shortDescription: pf registration ensures employee provident fund contributions are compliant and secure.
13.longDescription: pf registration involves enrolling the business with the employees' provident fund organization (epfo), maintaining employee records, contributing monthly to the fund, and filing returns. this ensures employees receive retirement benefits, tax savings, and social security while the employer maintains compliance with labor laws. professional handling guarantees accurate calculations, timely deposits, and adherence to statutory requirements, providing financial security and trust for employees.

14.name: esic registration
14.shortDescription: pf registration ensures employee provident fund contributions are compliant and secure.
14.longDescription: esic registration involves applying to the employees' state insurance corporation, submitting employee and business details, contributing monthly premiums, and filing returns. this enables employees to access health and social security benefits such as medical care, maternity, and sickness allowances. businesses comply with labor laws and enhance employee satisfaction and retention by providing statutory benefits efficiently through structured processes and regular reporting.

15.name: shop & establishment registration
15.shortDescription: shop & establishment registration legally recognizes a business for commercial operations.
15.longDescription: registration under the shops & establishment act involves submitting business details, owner information, and operational hours to the local municipal authority. once registered, the business complies with labor laws, maintains proper employee records, and avoids legal penalties. this formal recognition helps ecommerce and retail operations establish credibility, manage workforce effectively, and ensures adherence to statutory requirements for smooth commercial functioning.

16.name: professional tax
16.shortDescription: professional tax registration ensures proper tax deduction for employees according to state laws.
16.longDescription: professional tax registration involves enrolling the business under the relevant state authority, calculating monthly deductions from employees' salaries, submitting returns, and depositing taxes. compliance ensures employees' professional tax obligations are met, avoiding penalties, and maintaining smooth payroll management. businesses benefit from structured deduction processes and accurate reporting, supporting statutory compliance and operational efficiency.

17.name: import export code (iec) registration involves applying to the directorate general of foreign trade with business details, bank account information, and supporting documents. iec is required for exporting and importing goods and services. registration enables smooth customs clearance, access to government incentives, compliance with trade regulations, and legal recognition for international operations. this process ensures hassle-free cross-border transactions and smooth business expansion globally.
17.shortDescription: fssai registration certifies food businesses to comply with safety and hygiene standards.
17.longDescription: fssai registration involves applying through the food safety authority, submitting business and product details, meeting hygiene and operational standards, and obtaining the license. this certification ensures food safety, builds customer trust, and allows legal operation. compliance helps avoid penalties, ensures periodic inspections, and facilitates expansion into multiple regions or ecommerce platforms, establishing credibility and adherence to food regulations.

18.name: import export code
18.shortDescription: iec registration is mandatory for businesses engaging in international trade.
18.longDescription: import export code (iec) registration involves applying to the directorate general of foreign trade with business details, bank account information, and supporting documents. iec is required for exporting and importing goods and services. registration enables smooth customs clearance, access to government incentives, compliance with trade regulations, and legal recognition for international operations. this process ensures hassle-free cross-border transactions and smooth business expansion globally.

19.name: trademark application
19.shortDescription: protect your brand identity with comprehensive trademark registration. secure exclusive rights, prevent infringement, and build lasting brand equity across india.
19.longDescription:
your brand is your most valuable asset. trademark registration provides legal protection that prevents competitors from using your name, logo, or tagline—establishing exclusive rights that strengthen market position.
 
 our comprehensive trademark service includes thorough name/logo searches to assess availability, strategic class selection for optimal protection, application drafting and filing with the trade marks registry, and managing any objections or oppositions that arise. we guide you through every stage until your trademark certificate is secured.
 
 a registered trademark isn't just legal protection—it's a business asset that increases valuation, enables licensing opportunities, and provides the foundation for building strong brand recognition and consumer trust.
19.highlights: comprehensive trademark search and availability analysis strategic class selection for maximum protection expert application preparation and filing objection and opposition handling exclusive nationwide brand rights for 10 years enhanced brand equity and legal recourse against infringement

20.name: trademark registration
20.shortDescription: secure your brand identity and distinguish your products or services legally.
20.longDescription: trademark registration provides legal protection for your brand name, logo, or slogan, preventing unauthorized use by competitors. the process involves conducting a comprehensive search, preparing and filing the application with the trade marks registry, responding to official objections (if any), and finally, securing the registration certificate. a registered trademark is a valuable asset that offers exclusive rights across india, enhancing brand equity, building consumer trust, and enabling you to take legal action against infringement. it is a critical step for any business focused on long-term growth and brand recognition.
20.highlights: exclusive brand rights legal protection from infringement increased brand equity national validity.

21.name: operate
21.shortDescription: channel your energy into growth while we manage the intricacies of operational efficiency. at task360, our approach is tailored for startups, ensuring compliance is straightforward and aligned with your growth trajectory.

22.name: accounting & taxation
22.shortDescription: professional accounting and tax compliance services keeping your finances accurate, returns timely, and business audit-ready. focus on growth while we manage your numbers.
22.longDescription:
strong financial management is the backbone of sustainable business success. our accounting & taxation services provide the precision and reliability you need to maintain clean books, meet compliance deadlines, and make informed decisions.
 
 we handle complete bookkeeping, monthly/quarterly financial statement preparation, gst compliance including return filings and reconciliation, tds management with proper deductions and challans, and income tax return preparation for individuals and businesses. our approach combines accuracy with proactive planning—ensuring you maximize legitimate deductions while maintaining full compliance.
 
 with timely reminders, error-free documentation, and clear financial reporting, you gain complete visibility into your business performance. we don't just process transactions—we provide the financial clarity that drives smart decision-making.
22.highlights: accurate daily bookkeeping and financial record management monthly/quarterly financial statements and mis reports complete gst compliance: filings, reconciliation, and planning tds management with timely challans and returns expert income tax return preparation and filing proactive compliance alerts to prevent penalties clear financial insights supporting strategic decisions

23.name: accounting & book keeping
23.shortDescription: systematic management of all financial records to ensure compliance and accurate reporting.
23.longDescription: professional accounting and book keeping services involve recording all financial transactions, maintaining ledgers, reconciling bank statements, managing accounts payable and receivable, and preparing periodic financial statements (profit & loss, balance sheet). our services ensure your records are accurate, up-to-date, and fully compliant with generally accepted accounting principles (gaap). this service is essential for effective financial analysis, budgeting, managing cash flow, and providing accurate data needed for tax filings and investor reporting.
23.highlights: accurate financial records statutory compliance cash flow visibility audit readiness.

24.name: gst filings
24.shortDescription: timely and accurate filing of goods and services tax returns to ensure compliance and avoid penalties.
24.longDescription: gst filings services cover the preparation and submission of various mandated gst returns (e.g., gstr-1, gstr-3b, annual returns) based on your business transactions. this involves meticulous reconciliation of sales and purchase data, proper classification of goods and services, and correct calculation of tax liabilities and input tax credits (itc). outsourcing this ensures adherence to frequent regulatory deadlines, minimizes the risk of compliance errors, and maximizes eligible itc claims, helping you avoid penalties and maintain a clean compliance record with the tax authorities.
24.highlights: penalty avoidance maximized input tax credit (itc) timely submission error-free compliance.

25.name: tds / with holding tax
25.shortDescription: comprehensive management and deposit of tax deducted at source (tds) and related filings.
25.longDescription: this service covers the statutory requirements of tds/tcs (tax collected at source) compliance, including calculating the correct amount to be withheld, timely deposit of the tax with the government, and filing of quarterly tds returns (e.g., form 24q, 26q). we manage the issuance of tds certificates (form 16/16a) to deductees. proper management of tds is crucial for businesses to avoid penalties and interest, ensuring they fulfill their obligations as a tax deductor/collector under the income tax act.
25.highlights: statutory compliance accurate calculation timely deposits error-free return filing.

26.name: income tax returns
26.shortDescription: expert preparation and filing of corporate and individual income tax returns for full compliance.
26.longDescription: income tax return (itr) filing involves calculating taxable income, claiming all eligible deductions and exemptions, and submitting the appropriate itr form (e.g., itr-6 for companies) to the income tax department. our service ensures maximum tax efficiency, minimizes tax liability within legal bounds, and guarantees timely filing to avoid penalties. this is critical for maintaining financial compliance, facilitating loan applications, and completing business audits.
26.highlights: optimized tax liability maximum deductions/exemptions penalty avoidance quick processing.

27.name: virtual cfo
27.shortDescription: strategic financial leadership at a fraction of full-time cfo cost. get expert budgeting, cash-flow management, kpi insights, and growth-focused financial planning.
27.longDescription:
growing businesses need more than accounting—they need strategic financial leadership. our virtual cfo services provide experienced financial guidance without the expense and complexity of hiring a full-time cfo.
 
 your dedicated virtual cfo oversees your complete financial ecosystem: budgeting and forecasting, cash-flow planning and monitoring, profitability analysis, cost optimization strategies, kpi dashboard creation, tax planning, and board-ready financial reports. we provide real-time insights that help you make confident decisions about hiring, pricing, expansion, and capital allocation.
 
 whether preparing for fundraising, managing rapid growth, or establishing financial controls, we serve as your long-term partner in profitability and sustainable scaling. you get c-level financial expertise adapted to your specific business model and growth stage.
27.highlights: strategic financial planning, budgeting, and forecasting cash-flow management and working capital optimization monthly financial reviews with actionable performance insights custom kpi dashboards for data-driven decision making profitability analysis and cost-reduction strategies tax planning and comprehensive compliance oversight investor/board-ready financial presentations and reports

28.name: secretarial compliances
28.shortDescription: comprehensive roc and corporate secretarial services maintaining legal compliance, governance standards, and investor readiness. expert handling of esop, sar, resolutions, and closure.
28.longDescription:
corporate compliance is non-negotiable for maintaining legal standing and stakeholder trust. our secretarial compliance services ensure your company meets all mca/roc requirements while adhering to best governance practices.
 
 we provide complete support across board meetings, agm/egm management, statutory filing including annual returns, director appointments and resignations, share capital changes, and compliance tracking. for startups, we offer specialized expertise in esop scheme drafting and implementation, stock appreciation rights (sar) structuring, and employee incentive planning.
 
 when needed, we also manage company closure procedures including voluntary strike-off, final filings, and proper wind-up documentation. our meticulous approach ensures accuracy, timeliness, and complete adherence to corporate law—protecting you from penalties while maintaining a clean compliance record.
28.highlights: complete mca/roc compliance and statutory filing management board and shareholder meeting coordination and minutes esop design, documentation, and implementation for startups stock appreciation rights (sar) structuring and agreements company closure services: strike-off, filings, wind-up accurate corporate governance and resolution management proactive compliance calendar with timely alerts

29.name: startup esops
29.shortDescription: design and implement employee stock option plans to attract top talent, align team interests, and drive startup growth with equity-based incentives.
29.longDescription:
employee stock option plans (esops) are critical tools for startups to attract, retain, and motivate talented employees by offering them ownership in the company. our esop services provide comprehensive support from scheme design to complete implementation and ongoing management.
 
 we assist in structuring esop pools, determining vesting schedules, establishing exercise prices, drafting esop policies and agreements, preparing board resolutions, and ensuring compliance with companies act requirements. we also handle esop grant letters, option exercise processes, and regulatory filings with mca/roc.
 
 our approach balances founder dilution concerns with competitive equity packages that attract top talent. we ensure your esop structure is tax-efficient, legally compliant, and aligned with industry best practices—creating powerful incentives that drive team performance and long-term commitment to your startup's success.
29.highlights: complete esop scheme design and documentation vesting schedule and exercise price structuring board resolutions and shareholder approvals grant letters and option agreements mca/roc compliance and filing support tax-efficient structuring for employees and company ongoing esop management and exercise support

30.name: stock appreciation rights
30.shortDescription: implement stock appreciation rights (sar) schemes providing employees with value appreciation benefits without equity dilution for founders.
30.longDescription:
stock appreciation rights (sar) offer an alternative to traditional esops, allowing companies to reward employees with the financial benefits of equity appreciation without actually issuing shares. this is particularly valuable when founders want to incentivize employees while minimizing dilution.
 
 we design and implement comprehensive sar schemes including grant structures, appreciation calculation methodologies, vesting schedules, payment mechanisms (cash or shares), and complete documentation. our service covers drafting sar policies, grant agreements, board resolutions, and establishing proper accounting treatment.
 
 sar schemes are ideal for mature startups, companies approaching ipo, or businesses wanting flexibility in employee incentives. we ensure your sar structure is compliant with accounting standards, tax regulations, and employment laws while creating meaningful incentives that align employee interests with company growth.
30.highlights: sar scheme design and implementation appreciation calculation and payment structures complete documentation and agreements accounting treatment and tax compliance vesting schedule and eligibility criteria minimal dilution compared to traditional esops board resolution and policy drafting

31.name: company closure
31.shortDescription: complete company closure services including voluntary strike-off, liquidation, and wind-up procedures with proper roc filings and regulatory compliance.
31.longDescription:
closing a company requires careful navigation of legal requirements and regulatory procedures. our company closure services provide end-to-end support for businesses winding down operations, ensuring proper closure with all statutory authorities while protecting directors from future liabilities.
 
 we handle all closure methods including fast track exit (fte/stk-2), voluntary strike-off under section 248, voluntary liquidation, and compulsory closure procedures. our comprehensive service covers board and shareholder resolutions, director declarations, roc filings, asset disposal documentation, creditor settlements, final accounts preparation, and obtaining closure certificates.
 
 whether closing due to business completion, restructuring, or other reasons, we ensure the process is legally compliant, properly documented, and completed efficiently. we protect directors from future claims by ensuring all liabilities are settled, employees are properly relieved, and regulatory obligations are fulfilled before final closure.
31.highlights: complete company closure and strike-off services fast track exit (fte) and stk-2 filing support voluntary and compulsory closure procedures board/shareholder resolutions and declarations final accounts and roc filing management creditor settlement and asset disposal documentation director liability protection and compliance

32.name: legal drafting
32.shortDescription: professional legal document drafting services covering contracts, agreements, policies, and corporate documentation for comprehensive business protection.
32.longDescription:
sound legal documentation forms the foundation of secure business operations and relationships. our legal drafting services provide expert preparation of all essential business documents, ensuring your interests are protected while maintaining operational flexibility.
 
 we draft comprehensive agreements tailored to your specific needs including partnership and founders' agreements, employment and consultant contracts, vendor and supplier agreements, ndas and confidentiality agreements, licensing and franchise agreements, service level agreements (slas), and terms of business. additionally, we prepare corporate policies including privacy policies, terms of service, employee handbooks, and code of conduct documents.
 
 our approach combines legal precision with business practicality—creating documents that are enforceable, clear, and aligned with your operational requirements. we ensure compliance with applicable laws while protecting your interests in commercial relationships, intellectual property, and business transactions.
32.highlights: comprehensive contract and agreement drafting partnership and founders' agreements employment, consultant, and contractor agreements vendor, supplier, and service agreements ndas, confidentiality, and ip agreements corporate policies and employee documentation terms of service and privacy policies

33.name: cofounders agreement
33.shortDescription: draft comprehensive founders' agreements defining equity split, roles, responsibilities, vesting, and exit terms to prevent future disputes.
33.longDescription:
a cofounders agreement is the most critical document for any startup with multiple founders. it establishes clear expectations, prevents disputes, and provides mechanisms for resolving conflicts that inevitably arise during the entrepreneurial journey.
 
 we draft detailed founders' agreements covering equity ownership and vesting schedules, roles and responsibilities of each founder, decision-making authority and voting rights, intellectual property assignment, salary and compensation structures, founder exit procedures (voluntary and involuntary), dispute resolution mechanisms, and confidentiality obligations. we also address sensitive topics like founder departure, equity buyback terms, and non-compete clauses.
 
 our agreements are customized to your specific startup dynamics, ensuring fair terms that protect all parties while maintaining team cohesion. we balance flexibility with clarity—creating documents that adapt to growth while providing certainty when disagreements occur. this upfront investment in proper documentation prevents costly disputes and protects your startup's future.
33.highlights: equity split and vesting schedule definition roles, responsibilities, and authority clarification intellectual property assignment and protection founder exit and buyback procedures dispute resolution mechanisms confidentiality and non-compete clauses customized to your startup's specific dynamics

34.name: reverse vesting
34.shortDescription: implement reverse vesting structures protecting startups from founder departure by establishing time-based equity earning schedules.
34.longDescription:
reverse vesting is a critical mechanism that protects startups when founders leave prematurely. unlike traditional vesting where equity is granted over time, reverse vesting assumes founders receive their equity upfront but must "earn" it by staying with the company.
 
 we structure and document comprehensive reverse vesting arrangements including vesting schedules , acceleration clauses (single and double-trigger), good/bad leaver definitions, buyback pricing mechanisms, and transfer restrictions. our service includes drafting vesting agreements, shareholder resolutions, and articles of association amendments.
 
 this structure ensures that if a founder leaves early, the company can repurchase unvested shares—maintaining fairness among remaining founders and preserving equity for future hires or investors. we design vesting terms that balance founder retention with fairness, ensuring your startup isn't damaged by premature departures while maintaining team motivation and commitment.
34.highlights: reverse vesting structure and schedule design cliff periods and acceleration provisions good leaver/bad leaver definitions equity buyback and pricing mechanisms shareholder agreement and aoa amendments investor-friendly structures for fundraising protection against premature founder departure

35.name: share purchase agreement
35.shortDescription: draft comprehensive share purchase agreements for equity transactions including investor funding, secondary sales, and acquisition deals.
35.longDescription:
share purchase agreements (spas) are critical legal documents governing equity transactions between parties. whether raising investment, facilitating secondary sales, or structuring acquisitions, properly drafted spas protect all parties while ensuring smooth transaction completion.
 
 we draft detailed spas covering purchase price and payment terms, representations and warranties from both parties, closing conditions and covenants, indemnification and liability provisions, drag-along and tag-along rights, anti-dilution protection, and dispute resolution mechanisms. for investment rounds, we ensure investor protection clauses are balanced with founder interests.
 
 our spas address complex scenarios including valuation mechanisms, escrow arrangements, earn-out provisions, and post-closing obligations. we ensure compliance with companies act, fema regulations (for foreign investment), and securities law requirements—creating legally sound agreements that facilitate successful equity transactions while protecting client interests.
35.highlights: comprehensive spa drafting for equity transactions investment rounds, secondary sales, and acquisitions price, payment, and closing condition structures representations, warranties, and indemnifications drag/tag-along and anti-dilution provisions fema and securities law compliance escrow and earn-out arrangement documentation

36.name: employment contract
36.shortDescription: draft robust employment contracts protecting business interests while clearly defining roles, compensation, confidentiality, and termination terms.
36.longDescription:
employment contracts form the legal foundation of employer-employee relationships, protecting business interests while establishing clear expectations. properly drafted contracts prevent disputes and provide legal protection for sensitive business information.
 
 we prepare comprehensive employment agreements covering job role and responsibilities, compensation and benefits structure, working hours and leave policies, probation and confirmation terms, confidentiality and non-disclosure obligations, intellectual property assignment clauses, non-compete and non-solicitation provisions, and termination conditions (notice periods, severance). we also address remote work arrangements, performance metrics, and dispute resolution procedures.
 
 our contracts comply with applicable labor laws while protecting your trade secrets, client relationships, and proprietary information. we balance employer protection with fair terms that attract talent—creating agreements that are enforceable, clear, and adapted to your specific business needs and industry requirements.
36.highlights: comprehensive employment contract drafting role definition and compensation structures confidentiality and ip assignment clauses non-compete and non-solicitation provisions termination, notice, and severance terms labor law compliance and enforceability customized for different roles and seniority levels

37.name: gst/indirect taxes
37.shortDescription: comprehensive gst and indirect tax advisory covering compliance, planning, litigation support, and international trade documentation.
37.longDescription:
gst and indirect tax management requires specialized expertise to ensure compliance while optimizing tax positions. our comprehensive gst/indirect taxes practice provides end-to-end support across all aspects of goods and services taxation.
 
 we offer strategic gst advisory including registration, return filing, reconciliation, input tax credit optimization, and compliance management. our services extend to handling gst notices, assessments, audits, and appellate proceedings. we provide transaction structuring advice to minimize tax impact while maintaining full compliance with gst laws.
 
 for businesses engaged in international trade, we offer customs and duty advisory, import-export documentation, dgft compliance, and duty drawback claims. our team stays current with frequent regulatory changes, providing proactive guidance that protects your interests while ensuring seamless operations across multiple states and jurisdictions.
37.highlights: complete gst registration, filing, and compliance input tax credit optimization and reconciliation gst advisory and transaction structuring notice handling, assessments, and audits litigation support and appellate services customs, import-export, and dgft compliance proactive updates on regulatory changes

38.name: gst services
38.shortDescription: end-to-end gst compliance including registration, monthly/quarterly filings, reconciliation, and input tax credit optimization.
38.longDescription:
gst compliance is complex and requires meticulous attention to detail. our gst services provide comprehensive support ensuring your business meets all filing deadlines while maximizing legitimate input tax credit claims and maintaining audit-ready documentation.
 
 we handle complete gst registration across multiple states, regular return filing (gstr-1, gstr-3b, gstr-9), proper invoice and e-way bill management, input-output reconciliation, and tax computation. our service includes gstr-2b reconciliation, e-invoice system implementation, and handling annual returns with supporting documentation.
 
 we proactively identify compliance gaps, rectify errors before they become issues, and provide timely alerts for filing deadlines. our approach combines technical expertise with practical business understanding—ensuring you maintain clean gst records, avoid penalties, and maximize available tax benefits while focusing on business growth.
38.highlights: gst registration across multiple states monthly/quarterly return filing (gstr-1, 3b, 9) comprehensive input-output reconciliation input tax credit (itc) optimization e-invoice and e-way bill implementation gst audit preparation and documentation timely alerts and proactive compliance management

39.name: litigation support services
39.shortDescription: expert representation in gst disputes, assessments, appeals, and tribunal proceedings protecting your interests throughout litigation.
39.longDescription:
gst disputes and assessments require specialized expertise to navigate effectively. our litigation support services provide comprehensive representation across all stages of indirect tax disputes—from initial notices through appellate proceedings and tribunal hearings.
 
 we handle gst notice responses, demand proceedings, assessment hearings, and personal hearings before tax authorities. our service includes drafting detailed replies with supporting documentation, presenting cases before adjudicating authorities, filing appeals before commissioner (appeals) and gst appellate tribunal, and representing clients in settlement proceedings.
 
 our approach combines technical tax knowledge with strong advocacy skills. we analyze the merits of your case, develop robust legal strategies, prepare comprehensive written submissions, and provide aggressive representation to protect your interests. our goal is favorable resolution—whether through settlement, appeal success, or litigation—while minimizing business disruption and financial impact.
39.highlights: gst notice and demand response preparation representation in assessment and adjudication proceedings appeals before commissioner (appeals) and tribunal personal hearing representation and advocacy settlement and amnesty scheme applications comprehensive legal strategy and documentation protection of business interests throughout litigation

40.name: international trade
40.shortDescription: comprehensive international trade advisory covering customs, dgft compliance, import-export documentation, and duty optimization.
40.longDescription:
international trade involves complex regulatory requirements across customs, foreign trade policy, and duty structures. our international trade services provide expert guidance ensuring smooth cross-border transactions while optimizing duty costs and maintaining full compliance.
 
 we assist with customs classification and valuation, import-export licenses and iec registration, advance authorization and epcg schemes, dgft compliance and regulatory filings, customs duty planning and optimization, free trade agreement (fta) benefits, and handling customs assessments and audits. we also support with duty drawback claims, sez/eou procedures, and anti-dumping/safeguard matters.
 
 our service combines technical customs expertise with practical trade facilitation—helping you navigate the complexities of international commerce efficiently. we ensure your import-export operations comply with all regulations while minimizing duty costs through legitimate planning and scheme utilization, ultimately supporting your global business expansion.
40.highlights: customs classification, valuation, and compliance import-export licenses and iec procedures dgft schemes: advance authorization, epcg, etc. free trade agreement (fta) advisory duty drawback and refund claim support customs assessment and audit handling sez/eou compliance and documentation

41.name: training & awareness program
41.shortDescription: customized gst and indirect tax training programs building in-house expertise and ensuring team compliance awareness.
41.longDescription:
building in-house gst and indirect tax expertise is essential for sustainable compliance and risk management. our training & awareness programs equip your team with practical knowledge and skills to handle day-to-day tax matters effectively.
 
 we design and deliver customized training covering gst fundamentals and practical compliance, input tax credit rules and optimization, e-invoicing and e-way bill requirements, return filing and reconciliation processes, and handling common compliance scenarios. programs are tailored to different audiences—from finance teams to sales personnel—ensuring relevant, actionable learning.
 
 our training approach combines technical knowledge with real-world examples and case studies from your industry. we use interactive sessions, practical exercises, and ongoing support materials to ensure knowledge retention and application. regular refresher programs keep your team updated on regulatory changes—building sustainable compliance capability within your organization.
41.highlights: customized gst and indirect tax training programs compliance awareness for different business functions input tax credit and reconciliation training e-invoice and e-way bill system training practical case studies and industry examples regular updates on regulatory changes building sustainable in-house compliance capability

42.name: grow
42.shortDescription: we're committed to propelling startups towards enduring success. let's navigate the growth journey together, ensuring your rise is both strategic and sustainable.
42.longDescription:
growth isn’t just about scaling fast—it’s about scaling right. our grow services are designed to help startups and ecommerce businesses navigate their expansion journey with clarity, structure, and strategy. from strengthening financial systems to optimizing operations, improving compliance, and unlocking new opportunities, we partner with you at every stage of your scale-up journey.
 
 we bring a blend of financial intelligence, operational expertise, and forward-looking advisory to help you make confident decisions. whether you're expanding teams, raising funds, entering new markets, or preparing for sustained long-term growth, we ensure every step is backed by solid planning and powerful execution.
 
 we're committed to propelling startups toward enduring success—helping you rise with purpose, precision, and sustainable momentum.
42.highlights: strategic growth planning tailored to your business model and scale-up goals operational & financial optimization to improve efficiency and profitability support for fundraising, investor readiness & expansion planning data-driven insights through structured reporting and kpi tracking risk and compliance oversight to keep growth stable and sustainable scalable systems setup including accounting, processes, and controls guidance for new market entry, team expansion & business restructuring ideal for startups, d2c/ecommerce brands, and fast-growing smes

43.name: startup fundraise
43.shortDescription: end-to-end fundraising support from valuation to pitch deck. get investor-ready with proper due diligence, compelling presentations, and strong financial modeling.
43.longDescription:
raising capital requires preparation, credibility, and compelling presentation. our startup fundraise services provide comprehensive support to help you attract investors and close funding rounds successfully.
 
 we start with accurate valuation using industry-standard methodologies and comparable analysis—giving you a defensible number backed by solid financial logic. our due diligence team reviews your books, compliance status, and business processes, identifying and resolving any gaps that could concern investors.
 
 finally, we create professional, data-driven pitch decks that tell your story effectively: clear problem/solution articulation, market opportunity quantification, business model explanation, traction demonstration, and realistic financial projections. we ensure investors see a well-prepared, credible opportunity worthy of their capital.
43.highlights: professional startup valuation using proven methodologies comprehensive financial and compliance due diligence investor-ready pitch deck creation with compelling storytelling financial modeling: projections, unit economics, scenarios books clean-up and compliance gap resolution documentation support for term sheets and agreements faster fundraising with expert guidance and preparation

44.name: valuation advisory
44.shortDescription: professional startup valuation using industry-standard methodologies providing defensible numbers for fundraising, m&a, and compliance.
44.longDescription:
accurate business valuation is critical for fundraising, mergers and acquisitions, esop pricing, and compliance requirements. our valuation advisory services provide professionally prepared valuations using recognized methodologies that stand up to investor scrutiny and regulatory requirements.
 
 we employ multiple valuation approaches including discounted cash flow (dcf) analysis, comparable company analysis (trading comps), precedent transaction analysis (m&a comps), and venture capital method for early-stage startups. our valuations consider your business model, growth trajectory, market size, competitive positioning, financial performance, and risk factors.
 
 for regulatory purposes, we provide valuations compliant with companies act (for esops, buybacks, m&a), income tax act (for capital gains), and fema regulations (for foreign investment). our comprehensive valuation reports include detailed financial modeling, assumption documentation, and sensitivity analysis—providing stakeholders with clear rationale and defensible numbers that support successful transactions.
44.highlights: professional business valuation using standard methodologies dcf, comparable company, and transaction analysis startup-specific valuation (venture capital method) compliance with companies act, it act, and fema esop pricing and fair market value determination comprehensive reports with detailed assumptions support for fundraising, m&a, and compliance needs

45.name: due diligence
45.shortDescription: thorough financial and compliance due diligence identifying risks, gaps, and opportunities in m&a, fundraising, and investment transactions.
45.longDescription:
due diligence is essential for informed decision-making in investments, acquisitions, and major business transactions. our due diligence services provide comprehensive analysis of financial, legal, tax, and operational aspects—identifying risks, uncovering issues, and validating assumptions before commitments are made.
 
 we conduct detailed reviews covering financial statements and accounting practices, tax compliance and contingent liabilities, legal documentation and contractual obligations, regulatory compliance across all areas, operational efficiency and business processes, and management representations verification. for investor due diligence, we validate business models, revenue projections, customer contracts, and intellectual property.
 
 our due diligence reports provide clear risk assessment, quantification of identified issues, and recommended remediation steps. we help investors make informed decisions, assist buyers in negotiating better terms, and support sellers in proactively addressing gaps before transactions. our thorough approach protects your interests while facilitating successful deal closure.
45.highlights: comprehensive financial and compliance due diligence tax, legal, and operational review risk identification and quantification verification of financial statements and representations regulatory compliance assessment across all areas detailed reports with remediation recommendations support for fundraising, m&a, and investment decisions

46.name: pitch deck
46.shortDescription: create compelling, investor-ready pitch decks combining powerful storytelling with strong financial data to secure funding.
46.longDescription:
a powerful pitch deck can make the difference between securing funding and getting passed over. our pitch deck services create compelling presentations that clearly communicate your value proposition, market opportunity, and growth potential while building investor confidence.
 
 we craft comprehensive pitch decks covering problem-solution articulation, market size and opportunity quantification, business model and revenue streams explanation, competitive landscape and differentiation, traction metrics and growth trajectory, team credentials and execution capability, financial projections and unit economics, and funding requirements with clear use of proceeds. each slide is designed for maximum impact with clear visuals, data-driven insights, and compelling narrative flow.
 
 our approach combines financial expertise with storytelling skills—ensuring your deck passes both the "numbers test" and the "vision test." we create presentations that work for initial meetings, follow-up deep dives, and email circulation—helping you communicate effectively with angels, vcs, and institutional investors throughout the fundraising process.
46.highlights: professionally designed investor-ready pitch decks clear problem-solution and value proposition market opportunity and competitive analysis strong traction metrics and growth story detailed financial projections and unit economics compelling narrative flow and visual design customized for different investor audiences

47.name: legal services
47.shortDescription: reliable legal drafting, advisory, and compliance support protecting your business interests. expert contract preparation, policy documentation, and ongoing legal guidance.
47.longDescription:
sound legal foundations prevent costly disputes and protect business interests. our legal services provide expert support across contract drafting, policy creation, and compliance advisory—ensuring your operations are legally secure.
 
 we draft and review all critical agreements: founders' agreements defining roles and equity, employment contracts protecting confidential information, vendor and partnership agreements establishing clear terms, ndas safeguarding proprietary information, and shareholders agreements governing ownership rights.
 
 additionally, we prepare essential policies for digital businesses including terms of service, privacy policies, refund/cancellation policies, and regulatory compliance documentation. our practical, business-focused approach balances legal protection with operational efficiency.
47.highlights: comprehensive contract drafting and review services founders, shareholder, and partnership agreement preparation employment contracts, consultant agreements, and ndas vendor, supplier, and customer contract management digital business policies: terms, privacy, refund, etc. legal advisory tailored to startups and growing businesses risk assessment and dispute prevention strategies

48.name: fdi compliances under fema
48.shortDescription: expert fema compliance support for foreign investment including reporting, documentation, rbi filings, and regulatory advisory.
48.longDescription:
foreign direct investment (fdi) in india is governed by fema regulations requiring strict compliance with reporting and documentation requirements. our fdi compliance services ensure your foreign investments comply with all rbi and government regulations while maintaining operational flexibility.
 
 we handle comprehensive fema compliance including fdi policy advisory and sector-specific restrictions, advance intimation and government approvals (where required), form fc-gpr filing for share issuance and transfer, form fc-trs filing for fund transfers, downstream investment reporting, odi (outbound investment) compliance, and form llp-fdi for foreign investment in llps. we also assist with pricing guidelines compliance, repatriation procedures, and handling rbi inquiries.
 
 our proactive approach ensures timely filings, proper documentation, and ongoing compliance with fema regulations. we keep you updated on policy changes affecting your sector, help structure investments optimally within regulatory frameworks, and provide quick resolution of compliance issues—protecting your business from penalties while facilitating smooth foreign investment operations.
48.highlights: complete fema compliance for foreign investment fc-gpr and fc-trs filing and reporting fdi policy advisory and sector analysis government approval applications where required pricing guidelines and valuation compliance downstream and outbound investment reporting proactive regulatory updates and rbi liaison

49.name: business consultancy
49.shortDescription: strategic business consulting powered by financial modeling and tax advisory. make data-driven decisions with expert insights into profitability, planning, and optimization.
49.longDescription:
sustainable growth requires strategic clarity backed by solid numbers. our business consultancy services combine financial modeling expertise with comprehensive tax planning to support smarter decision-making.
 
 we build detailed financial models analyzing revenue streams, cost structures, profitability drivers, and cash-flow scenarios. these models help you evaluate new opportunities, test pricing strategies, plan investments, and forecast business performance under various scenarios.
 
 our income tax consultancy ensures full compliance while optimizing your tax position through legitimate planning strategies. we identify deduction opportunities, structure transactions efficiently, and provide proactive guidance on tax implications of business decisions.
 
 whether launching new products, expanding operations, or evaluating strategic options, we provide the analytical rigor and tax insight that supports confident, informed decision-making.
49.highlights: detailed financial modeling for planning and forecasting scenario analysis for investments, pricing, and expansion comprehensive income tax consultancy and optimization strategic tax planning reducing liabilities legally profitability and cost structure analysis business planning support with data-driven insights expert guidance for startups and growing enterprises

50.name: financial modeling
50.shortDescription: build detailed financial models for forecasting, scenario planning, investment analysis, and strategic decision-making support.
50.longDescription:
sound financial modeling is essential for business planning, fundraising, and strategic decision-making. our financial modeling services create sophisticated, dynamic models that provide clear insights into business performance, growth scenarios, and financial outcomes.
 
 we build comprehensive models incorporating historical financial analysis, revenue forecasting by product/service lines, cost structure and operating expense modeling, working capital and cash flow projections, capital expenditure planning, profitability analysis by segment, and scenario analysis (base, optimistic, pessimistic cases). our models include sensitivity analysis identifying key value drivers and break-even analysis for decision support.
 
 whether planning new initiatives, evaluating pricing strategies, preparing for fundraising, or analyzing acquisition opportunities, our models provide the financial clarity you need. we create flexible, user-friendly models with clear assumptions, logical structure, and actionable outputs—empowering you to make data-driven decisions with confidence about your business's financial future.
50.highlights: comprehensive financial forecasting and modeling revenue, cost, and cash-flow projections scenario and sensitivity analysis unit economics and profitability modeling fundraising and investor-focused models m&a valuation and deal analysis flexible, dynamic models supporting decision-making

51.name: income tax consultancy
51.shortDescription: strategic income tax advisory optimizing tax positions through legitimate planning while ensuring full compliance and litigation support.
51.longDescription:
effective income tax management requires proactive planning combined with precise compliance. our income tax consultancy services provide comprehensive support optimizing your tax position through legitimate strategies while ensuring full adherence to tax laws.
 
 we offer strategic tax planning for individuals and businesses, corporate restructuring and merger advisory, capital gains tax optimization strategies, investment structuring for tax efficiency, claiming all eligible deductions and exemptions, and transfer pricing compliance for related-party transactions. we also provide representation in tax assessments, appeals, and litigation support.
 
 our consultancy approach combines deep technical knowledge with practical business understanding. we identify tax-saving opportunities within legal boundaries, structure transactions for optimal tax treatment, and ensure compliance with reporting requirements. regular tax health checks help identify and address potential issues proactively—minimizing tax liability while eliminating compliance risks and avoiding costly disputes with tax authorities.
51.highlights: strategic income tax planning and optimization corporate restructuring and transaction advisory capital gains and investment tax planning transfer pricing compliance and documentation assessment and appellate representation tax health checks and risk assessment maximizing deductions within legal frameworks

52.name: transaction advisory service
52.shortDescription: comprehensive transaction advisory covering m&a, restructuring, ipos, and cross-border deals with financial, tax, and regulatory expertise.
52.longDescription:
complex business transactions require integrated advisory covering financial, tax, legal, and regulatory aspects. our transaction advisory services provide end-to-end support for mergers, acquisitions, restructuring, ipos, and international transactions—ensuring successful execution while protecting client interests.
 
 we provide comprehensive transaction support including m&a advisory (buy-side and sell-side), business valuation and deal structuring, financial and tax due diligence, transaction structuring for tax efficiency, regulatory compliance and approval management, and post-transaction integration support. for cross-border deals, we handle fema compliance, withholding tax, and international structuring.
 
 our multidisciplinary approach combines technical expertise across finance, taxation, and compliance with strong transaction execution skills. we help identify suitable opportunities, conduct thorough due diligence, structure deals optimally, negotiate favorable terms, and ensure smooth closing—maximizing value while managing risks throughout the transaction lifecycle.
52.highlights: end-to-end m&a transaction advisory valuation, due diligence, and deal structuring tax-efficient transaction design regulatory compliance and approval management cross-border transaction expertise ipo readiness and sme listing support post-transaction integration and support

53.name: merger and acquisition
53.shortDescription: strategic m&a advisory for business combinations including deal sourcing, valuation, structuring, negotiation, and seamless execution.
53.longDescription:
mergers and acquisitions represent significant strategic moves requiring careful planning and execution. our m&a advisory services provide comprehensive support across the entire transaction lifecycle—from strategy development through post-merger integration.
 
 for buy-side engagements, we assist with target identification and evaluation, business valuation and financial analysis, comprehensive due diligence, deal structuring and financing advisory, negotiation support, and transaction documentation. for sell-side assignments, we prepare businesses for sale, conduct buyer identification and outreach, manage the sale process, maximize valuation, and negotiate optimal terms.
 
 we structure transactions for tax efficiency considering income tax, capital gains, stamp duty, and gst implications. our service includes regulatory compliance (cci, sebi, sectoral approvals), synergy analysis, and post-merger integration planning. throughout the process, we protect your interests while facilitating successful deal closure—whether acquiring growth opportunities or realizing value through strategic exits.
53.highlights: buy-side and sell-side m&a advisory target identification and strategic evaluation business valuation and financial analysis comprehensive transaction due diligence tax-efficient deal structuring negotiation support and documentation regulatory approvals and integration planning

54.name: reverse flip
54.shortDescription: navigate reverse flip transactions bringing foreign-domiciled companies back to india with complete regulatory and tax compliance.
54.longDescription:
reverse flip involves relocating a company's domicile from overseas back to india—a complex process gaining popularity as indian startups seek domestic listing opportunities. our reverse flip services provide end-to-end support navigating regulatory, tax, and operational complexities.
 
 we assist with strategic planning for optimal reverse flip structure, fema and rbi compliance for share transfers and capital infusion, tax implications assessment including exit tax and capital gains for foreign shareholders, corporate structuring including share swaps and mergers, regulatory approvals from rbi, sebi, and sectoral authorities, and valuation compliance for indian entity creation.
 
 reverse flips require coordinating indian and foreign legal systems, managing shareholder consent, addressing employee esop transitions, and ensuring continuity of operations. we provide integrated advisory covering all aspects—helping you successfully relocate your business to india while maintaining shareholder value, operational continuity, and regulatory compliance. our expertise ensures smooth execution of this complex strategic move.
54.highlights: complete reverse flip transaction advisory fema and rbi regulatory compliance tax structuring and exit tax planning share swap, merger, and restructuring support valuation compliance for indian entity regulatory approvals and documentation shareholder and esop management

55.name: sme ipo
55.shortDescription: end-to-end sme ipo advisory including listing preparation, compliance, documentation, regulatory filings, and successful market debut.
55.longDescription:
taking your sme public through ipo on bse sme or nse emerge platforms provides capital access and credibility while maintaining manageable compliance. our sme ipo services offer comprehensive support from initial assessment through successful listing and beyond.
 
 we provide ipo readiness assessment, corporate governance and compliance gap analysis, financial statement preparation and audit coordination, drhp (draft red herring prospectus) preparation, regulatory filing with stock exchanges and sebi, appointment of merchant bankers and other intermediaries, investor roadshows and book-building support, and post-listing compliance advisory.
 
 our service covers all aspects including capital restructuring, resolution of past compliance issues, board strengthening, internal control implementation, and ipo marketing strategy. we ensure your sme meets all eligibility criteria, maintains documentation standards, and presents compelling investment opportunity to retail and institutional investors. our expertise facilitates smooth ipo execution while setting foundation for successful public market performance.
55.highlights: complete sme ipo preparation and execution corporate governance and compliance readiness financial statement preparation and audit support drhp preparation and regulatory filings stock exchange and sebi liaison intermediary appointment and coordination post-listing compliance and investor relations

56.name: flip
56.shortDescription: structure flip transactions establishing foreign holding companies for indian businesses enabling international investment and growth.
56.longDescription:
flip transactions involve creating a foreign holding company structure above an existing indian business—common when startups seek foreign venture capital or plan international expansion. our flip transaction services provide expert guidance on this strategic restructuring while ensuring complete compliance.
 
 we assist with jurisdiction selection (singapore, delaware, mauritius, etc.) considering tax treaties and business objectives, foreign company incorporation and setup, indian entity shareholding transfer to foreign parent, fema compliance for share transfers and odi, tax structuring including exit tax mitigation for indian shareholders, valuation compliance and transfer pricing documentation, and regulatory approvals where required.
 
 flip transactions require careful planning addressing tax implications for founders and investors, managing esop transitions, maintaining business continuity, and ensuring proper documentation across jurisdictions. we coordinate with foreign legal counsel while managing indian regulatory aspects—ensuring your flip transaction is executed efficiently with optimal structure for future fundraising, expansion, and eventual exit opportunities.
56.highlights: complete flip transaction structuring and execution foreign holding company jurisdiction selection share transfer and odi compliance tax planning and exit tax mitigation fema regulatory compliance and approvals transfer pricing and valuation documentation esop transition and continuity management
